channel.title: Wich client
channel.description:
Hey guys, Which client would be the best for a Project Czar based server? Is Bluur's client any good?
Thanks, Relmitos.

item.title: Wich client
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

Bluurs client is great, it really all depend on how updated a client is…

I have a bluurs client that i spent a month working on…

I added godsword stances, new hitpoints bar, And many updated things…

Bluurs client is a good base client…

Or you can try using a delta base client…

Both are good, though Bluurs are a little more advanced.

Read full topic
